title: ocean week prizes
body: umm im participating in the ocean week i already have all the champs will u you gift a  cheap random skin instead???{{champion:432}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3931}}

replies.body: If you couldn't get a mystery champion normally - then instead you will receive a mystery skin. For extra clarity, the double legendary chance does not apply to this reward!
When will they be given out? I though they would be in with todays patch. Thanks : )
thank you so much riot much love been enjoying since season 1!!!!!!
